text: Lyudmila Shishova (; 1 June 1940 - 21 February 2004) was a Soviet fencer. In the 1960 Summer Olympics, she won gold in the women's team foil fencing. In the 1964 Summer Olympics, she won a silver medal. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Soviet fencers Category:Medalists at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:People from Nizhny Novgorod
title: Lyudmila Shishova
